Description.Text: SKYLOFTS at MGM Grand. MGM Grand has unveiled a rare and private sanctuary of sleek, elegant two-story hotel accommodations high above the spectacle that is the Las Vegas strip. SKYLOFTS at MGM Grand offers the quintessential Loft environment harmonizing design, decor, ambience and unparalleled vistas. Located on top of MGM Grand. LOFTS are available in one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans. Designed to accommodate Las Vegas' most sophisticated guests, the glamorous SKYLOFTS range in size from 1,400 to 6,000 sq ft. Master bathrooms offer dual vanity and infinity edge spa bathtubs both with inset televisions and steam showers. LOFT living areas are enhanced with custom Bang & Olufsen and Sony HDTV entertainment systems, iPod integrated, innovative wireless remote that controls all features throughout your LOFT, and fax machine with personalized number.

Located on top of MGM Grand; a "hotel within a hotel." Mobil Five5-Star. AAA 5-Diamond-rated SKYLOFTS at MGM Grand redefines "the high life," providing lavish detail and personalized services in elegant two-story lofts. Pre-arrival Concierge contact to arrange whatever your heart desires. Satisfaction is undeniable.

2 bedroom LOFT - 2-bedroom LOFT 3,000 sq ft. 2-bedroom,1 King Master and 2 Queens Master with 2.5 bath loft with a living room, dining area, media room with billiard table or foosball, based upon availability. Its furnishings are modern and pure luxury, attractive to the eye and ready for entertainment. Its color scheme features soft shades highlighted with blond or dark woods pools of light and vertical, textured design features.
2 bedroom BALCONY LOFT - 2-bedroom BALCONY LOFT 3,000 sq ft 2-bedroom,1 King Master and 2 Queens Master with 2.5 bath featuring a private balcony with spa. Sweeping mountains make this loft the ultimate retreat for relaxation and excitement. The loft includes a large entertaining area complete with wet bar, billiard table, and two large screen televisions. Incan Grey limestone floors and pure white walls are accented with luxurious black and beige furniture, colorful art, and natural light throughout the loft. The master bedroom includes a king bed and private workout room. Large, blond timber, walk-in wardrobes add to the effect of the oversized bathrooms. Additional features include a luxurious kitchen, dining area, library, and guest room with two queen beds.
3 bedroom LOFT - 3-bedroom LOFT 6,000 sq ft. Embodying the true essence of the SKYLOFTS all-loft luxury concept. A 3-bedroom, 1 King Master bedroom with Master bath downstairs, 1 King Master and 2 Queens Master both with oversized Master baths upstairs, featuring a large gallery foyer, extended living room, luxurious dining area for 8 people, comfortable bar, Butler pantry and a billiard room. The loft's furnishings are modern, artistic and attractive to the eye. Luxurious couches in beige, black or grey, metal and timber chairs and bar stools, minimalist black coffee tables and shelving, and walk-in wardrobes in black or blond timber all add to the effect. (1) ADA LOFT available in a 3-bedroom LOFT, 3.5 bath category, 3,000 sq ft.
1 bedroom LOFT - 1-bedroom LOFT 1,400 sq ft. A 1-bedroom 1 King Master bedroom, 1.5 bath luxury loft with a large living, dining area and wet bar. Its furnishings are modern and pure luxury, attractive to the eye and ready for entertainment. Its color scheme features soft shades highlighted with blond and dark woods, pools of light and vertical, textured design features.
